fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Troll a player, short-circuiting and roleblocking them.
- During the day, troll Duwii specifically. This has no tangible effect to gameplay.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Trolling an Estate player also gives them 3 Stress. Trolling an enemy to the Estate will make their visitors lose 1 Stress.
- When using your second ability, if Duwii is dead (and no role that can interact with the dead exists), or not a player in the current game, the host must send the <:trolled:1053520988790333470> emoji in Duwii's private channel. If Duwii is the host, I will hold them at gunpoint to do so.
